description:
Remote service state handling

BUG=160939
TEST=DriveFileSyncServiceTest.*

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=168182

messages.text: I know this'd look less cuter than the the original code... anyway can you take a look?
Updated the patch to add/fix more error code and removed origin-specific description. (And cc-ing more ppl to have more eyes)  Can you take another look?

http://codereview.chromium.org/11299008/diff/8007/chrome/browser/sync_file_system/drive_file_sync_service_unittest.cc

sort?

File chrome/browser/sync_file_system/remote_file_sync_service.h (right):

chrome/browser/sync_file_system/remote_file_sync_service.h:34: // local database corruption, no available account on the remote
maybe, "no available account" causes authentication error, so it'll be interpret as TEMPORARY_UNAVAILABLE.

http://codereview.chromium.org/11299008/diff/8007/chrome/browser/sync_file_system/remote_file_sync_service.h#newcode62
chrome/browser/sync_file_system/remote_file_sync_service.h:62: 
Could you add getters for state and description?

Thanks, updated.

subject: Remote service state handling
